info.official_title: Prospective Evaluation and Molecular Profiling in Patients With Gastric Tumors
info.inclusion_criteria:
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 2 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: Healthy volunteers allowed

inclusion_lines.line: Must have minimum age of 2 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: minimum age of 2 Years

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Patients with any of the following are eligible:

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients with any of the following are eligible

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Malignant or non-invasive, neoplastic lesions of the stomach confirmed by histopathology or cytopathology in a CLIA-certified laboratory;

criterions.exact_snippets: Malignant or non-invasive, neoplastic lesions of the stomach
confirmed by histopathology or cytopathology
in a CLIA-certified laboratory

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Suspicious lesions not yet confirmed, but considered likely to be related to the stomach pending further evaluation;

criterions.exact_snippets: Suspicious lesions not yet confirmed, but considered likely to be related to the stomach

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Confirmed, deleterious germline mutation (including but not limited to HDGC, GAPPS) known to predispose to gastric tumors;

criterions.exact_snippets: Confirmed, deleterious germline mutation ... known to predispose to gastric tumors
HDGC, GAPPS

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Confirmed or suspicious heritable gastric malignancy disorder;

criterions.exact_snippets: Confirmed or suspicious heritable gastric malignancy disorder

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Clinically suspicious personal or family medical history of gastric cancer or gastric cancer syndrome that warrants genetics evaluation.

criterions.exact_snippets: Clinically suspicious personal ... medical history of gastric cancer
criterions.criterion: personal medical history of gastric cancer

criterions.exact_snippets: Clinically suspicious ... family medical history of gastric cancer
criterions.criterion: family medical history of gastric cancer

criterions.exact_snippets: Clinically suspicious personal or family medical history of ... gastric cancer syndrome
criterions.criterion: personal or family medical history of gastric cancer syndrome

criterions.exact_snippets: warrants genetics evaluation

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Patients must have an ECOG performance score of 0-2.

criterions.exact_snippets: ECOG performance score of 0-2

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Age greater than or equal to 2 years. Note: Patients greater than or equal to 2 and less than or equal to 18 years of age may only participate in research sample collection if the tissue acquisition is performed during a clinically indicated surgical procedure, and the sampling of tissue, blood and urine does not add risk to the clinically indicated procedures.

criterions.exact_snippets: Age greater than or equal to 2 years.
Patients greater than or equal to 2 and less than or equal to 18 years of age
tissue acquisition is performed during a clinically indicated surgical procedure

requirements.expected_value: performed during a clinically indicated surgical procedure

criterions.exact_snippets: sampling of tissue, blood and urine does not add risk to the clinically indicated procedures

requirements.expected_value: does not add risk to the clinically indicated procedures

miscellaneous_lines.line: * The patient is a candidate for the clinically indicated medical evaluations that are being offered

criterions.exact_snippets: The patient is a candidate for the clinically indicated medical evaluations

miscellaneous_lines.line: * Ability of subject, their parents/guardians or legally authorized representative (LAR) to understand and must be willing to sign a written informed consent document.

criterions.exact_snippets: Ability of subject, their parents/guardians or legally authorized representative (LAR) to understand
must be willing to sign a written informed consent document

miscellaneous_lines.line: Candidates who do not meet the inclusion criteria.

criterions.exact_snippets: do not meet the inclusion criteria
